content.body: Domenic: Live URL Viewer is broken
Kaiido: did you want to review https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/11601 as well? If not, I'll merge it in a bit.
content.formatted_body: Kaiido: did you want to review https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/11601 as well? If not, I'll merge it in a bit.

content.body: I won't have much time in the following days to do a full review but from a quick glance it seemed ok to me and it seems your review did spot the potential issues already. So you can merge, I think.
Luke Warlow: does "validation" mean something for the setter or the getter?
content.formatted_body: Luke Warlow: does "validation" mean something for the setter or the getter?

content.body: For the getter, basically the bit where .control only returns labelable elements
Whereas popoverTargetElement (and all other current element reflection properties) return whatever you give them
Sorry I'm probably not being very clear, not really sure what to call that behaviour
Luke Warlow: maybe you could flush `forElement` out a bit more as an example so it's a bit clearer how it relates to the existing features and what new functionality it would offer.
content.formatted_body: Luke Warlow: maybe you could flush forElement out a bit more as an example so it's a bit clearer how it relates to the existing features and what new functionality it would offer.

content.body:
https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/11577#issuecomment-3292490346 - hopefully this clarifies things a bit.

The HTML spec PR for this would be I think a single line change to add the IDL attribute.
